xs.description: Extra small radius. Subtle corner rounding for small elements.

sm.description: Small radius. Usage: standard light corner rounding.

xl.description: Extra large radius. Usage: significant corner rounding.

md.description: Medium radius. Usage: balanced corner rounding for most elements.

2xs.description: Extra extra small radius. Usage: minimal rounding, subtle corner softening.

l.description: Large radius. Usage: prominent corner rounding.

2xl.description: Extra extra large radius. Usage: very rounded corners.

3xl.description: Triple extra large radius. Usage: highly rounded corners.

4xl.description: Quadruple extra large radius. Usage: maximum standard rounding.
